cause.description:
amfAR, The Foundation for AIDS Research, is one of the world's leading nonprofit organizations dedicated to the support of AIDS research, HIV prevention, treatment education, and the advocacy of sound AIDS-related public policy.
1. To Provide Education, Awareness, & Prevention.
2. Promote the Research of HIV/AIDS.
3. Advocate Positive AIDS-Related Policy.
cause.mission: support cutting-edge research on HIV/AIDS treatments and prevention methods, including an AIDS vaccine.
cause.name: amfAR
